5/2016 - Now : Senior Legal & Compliance Executive - Trung Nguyen International
Corporation
Trung Nguyen International Corporation (TNI) is established by Madame Le Hoang Diep Thao - the
founder and co-owner of Trung Nguyen Coffee Group. With the headquarter and two factories
located in Vietnam and other representative offices in Singapore, China, US, Australia, TNI aims to
 EXPERIENCE
Year(s) of Experience: 8
Current Level: Team Leader / Supervisor
bring reputable coffee brands from Viet Nam to the world. 
Trung Nguyen International Corporation is also developing King Coffee Chains now. 
Responsibilities: 
Contracting 
• Prepare, review and modify all contracts or any other documentation provide legal opinion to the
executive management's attention and reduce risk associated with contract documents. 
• Negotiate, review and draft documentation for business transactions and prepare and advise on
the necessary checklist to be adopted to ensure information is submitted on time. 
Legal issues 
• Review and provide legal advice on the specific cases related to corporation’s operation. 
• Manage agencies to register and get licenses of intellectual properties of Company. Suggest
solution to protect Company against any infringement of IP. 
• Liaise with relevant departments to ensure that where legal risks have been identified,
appropriate courses of action have been taken. 
• Provide legal protection and risk management advice to management and other departments. 
• Provide and interpret legal information, conduct training or update appropriate legal information to
staff. 
• Develop in-house law database for users friendly. 
• Develop the relationship with the law firms and agencies for corporation’ activities such as
litigation, registering of IP, RO, Subsidiaries in overseas… 
Compliance 
• Review and advise management on legal implications of internal policies and procedures. 
• Review and draft internal policies and ensure that they are in compliance with all statutory or legal
requirements. Litigation 
• Review progress of outstanding litigation and liaise with external lawyers during the proceeding to
protect for corporation’s rights and benefits.
9/2015 - 5/2016 : Legal Team Leader - Hoa Sen Group
Hoa Sen Group (183 Nguyen Van Troi, Ward 10, Phu Nhuan District, HCMC) 
Hoa Sen Group is the market leader in Vietnam Steel sheet and now broadening in purlin, steel pipe,
plastic pipe market. Hoa Sen Group has 7 subsidiaries, 4 manufacturing plants managed by the
parent company, 2 representative offices and over 190 branches across the country. 
Responsibilities: 
Legal 
• Compose, review and revise all contracts entered into by the parent company and subsidiaries,
especially in international trade, insurance, shipping… 
• Offer suggestions for company about issues related to enterprise law, labor law, listed company,
tax, FTA… 
• Updated and research new regulations to guarantee company activities compliance with Vietnam
Law and international rule. 
• Build and maintain working relationships with legal agencies. 
• Draft, get feedback, revise and finish important policies of Company such as company charter,
internal rules on corporate governance, Proposal and Award Policy … 
Other 
• Support in preparation of General meeting of shareholders, answer the questions of
shareholders… 
• Support in restructuring of Group. 
Other tasks as assigned. 
Report to: Head of Legislation and Assistance division.
8/2013 - 9/2015 : Assistant to Legal & Admin Manager - DUY ANH FASHION AND
COMESTIC CO., LTD (DAFC), a member of Imex Pan Pacific Group
DAFC (3rd Floor, Centec Tower, 72-74 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, Ward 6, District 3, HCMC) is the leading
luxury fashion distributor in Vietnam, with many of the world’s top brands such as: ROLEX,
BURBERRY, BVL, CARTIER, S.FERRAGAMO ... DAFC has more than 20 exclusive boutiques operating in
both HCMC and Hanoi, all in prime retail locations such as Diamond Plaza, Rex Arcade, Trang Tien
Plaza, Lotte Hanoi. 
Responsibilities: 
Legal 
• Draft and prepare contracts and other legal documents related to company activities. 
• Review, negotiate, advise and amend all contracts entered into by company such as leasing
contract, construction contract, franchising… Tracking contract’s implements. 
• Keep company updated with Vietnam Laws, particularly in the areas of commercial law,
international law, labor law, taxation, foreign investment law. 
• Research the law pertaining to company business and consult for BOD when assigned. 
• Submit and follow up submissions for licenses, approvals of company to Authorities. 
• Establish and maintain relationships with Authorities, legal agencies. 
• Other duties reasonably assigned by BOD 
Admin & Project management 
• Follow up the progress of company’s projects, guarantee the implements of contractor abide with
the signed contract. 
• Review and check the final settlement for company’s projects. 
• Keep as archives all legal documents, licenses and approvals of company, maintain and organize
them in systematic manner. 
• Translate the English version of contracts and legal documents, note the main ideas for BOD. 
Report to: Legal & Admin Manager and Managing Director.
10/2011 - 7/2013 : Legal staff - GOSU ONLINE CORPORATION
GOSU (5th Floor, WASECO Tower, 10 Pho Quang St, Tan Binh Dictrict, HCMC) is a publisher and
operator many popular online games in Vietnam: Age of Wushu, Ngao Kiem Vo Song… Besides that,
GOSU also has a technology website at gosu.vn. 
Report to: Director of HCM representative office and CEO. 
Responsibilities: 
Legal 
• Compose, check and negotiate contracts with local and international partners. Tracking contracts’
implement. 
• Guarantee company’s activities abide by national laws and international rules (labor, commerce,
company…) 
• Update policy of authority related to company’s activities 
• Assist Director in compliance of law in tax, labor management. 
• Consult for Board of Directors about Company Law. 
• Coordinate with administration department to developing regulation, process for business
activities. 
Business Assistant 
• Assist CEO in preparation and development documents for business and administration. 
• Coordinate with CEO Assistant for communicated network of Company (conference, meeting,
exhibition…)
 EDUCATION
